item.description:
We're moving dinner to TUESDAY in Harvard Square. I will be in Chicago over the weekend for the ALA conf and not back until the next day... and no definite confirmations yet. So, for a change from Wagamama, let's meet at Qdoba on Mass Ave.

On the agenda:
* Wikiconference New York in two weekends! Panels, open forum, ideas.
** there's a meetup of people interested in a US chapter on the schedule
* Wiki-intros at local universities and libraries -- updates from Tufts last month; a classics dept that's asking its PhD candidates to help put 30,000 items onto Wikisource? can it be?
* The latest from CK12, the Terminator free textbook project, and wikibooks
* Buenos Aires : how can we help wikis do argentina right?

SJ
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have an ALA sack with me and a green XO
item.name: The Boston Wikipedia July Meetup
